rules_text:
Trample
Whenever Thorned Basilisk deals combat damage to a player, promote it. [i](Put a loyalty counter on it. Then if it has three or more loyalty counters on it, transform it.)[/i]
special_text2:
Trample
Fanged Butcher can't be blocked by more than one creature.
[-1]: Target creature can't block this turn.
[-1]: Target creature blocks this turn if able.
